info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:51PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Rio Blanco County through 515 PM MDT... At 450 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles south of Rangely, or 54 miles southeast of Vernal, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Rio Blanco County. This includes the following highways... Colorado 64 between mile markers 22 and 24. Colorado 139 between mile markers 52 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
